posts.author: Greedy_CR
posts.content:
Hello all, I am looking for a 40 elf fighter wizard and PM build with preference of using a bastard sword. Additionally the build needs to have at least 2 levels of wizard and 3 levels of fighter early so I can use an item specialized for something called the bladecastor blade which is a bastardsword. I tried to copy a finished lvl 40 human PM build in epic builds but it did not pan out as much as I'd liked it to as an elf. Additionally id like to Max out pm as much as possible to try and get 30 levels in PM. Is this doable or even viable to be an effective tankyish dpsish elf character capable of using bastardsword and board? Thank you very much. Dev crit is not a must and I'd like to at least have a higher crit chance. Additionally I'd like a nice mix of str and the ability to have still spell for casting damage shields and a slightly higher AB.

V/r
Greedy

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Greedy_CR wrote: Hello all, I am looking for a 40 elf fighter wizard and PM build with preference of using a bastard sword.
It can be done.
Additionally the build needs to have at least 2 levels of wizard and 3 levels of fighter early so I can use an item specialized for something called the bladecastor blade which is a bastardsword.
It can be done.
I tried to copy a finished lvl 40 human PM build in epic builds but it did not pan out as much as I'd liked it to as an elf.
Maybe it will help if you can post the build or give us a link, and describe what did not work with it.
Additionally id like to Max out pm as much as possible to try and get 30 levels in PM. Is this doable or even viable to be an effective tankyish dpsish elf character capable of using bastardsword and board?
It can be done, but many levels of wizard or PM pre-epic will give a bad BAB. If it is a tank you want, elf is not the best race for that with it's racial penalty to constitution. If you want to build a tank with PM, bard is also better than wizard, because it has tumble as class skill for better AC, and better BAB progression than wizard. If you on the other hand want to focus more on spells, wizard works better with PM than bard does.
Thank you very much. Dev crit is not a must and I'd like to at least have a higher crit chance. Additionally I'd like a nice mix of str and the ability to have still spell for casting damage shields and a slightly higher AB.
Beware that wizard spells cast from a PM still have the caster level of the wizard class. So even if you are able to cast Mestil's acid sheath, because of all your PM levels, it will only last 2 rounds and do damage like lvl 2 spell, if your wizard level is 2.
There may be a workaround if you can use sequencer robes and cast spells from that, but that is limited to the few spells you can store in the sequencer. And you will probably rather use heavy armor with your tank.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
I will disappoint you but that build has a really bad attack bonus (33) and that means you won't be able to hit consistently if you are playing even in a moderate difficult environment.
Being an Elf in addition to that is again the wrong choice since Elves have nothing to add to this sort of build.
Besides, being tanky has little to do with taking all 30 PM levels & the demi-lich summon is not good enough under the standard A.I to justify that.

Try this instead, and if you want to be an Elf and take a bastard-sword, you can do it with minimal effort,
Deathless Pariah => http://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/buil ... 02355.html
